dt: {bc}to have the reverse of the desired or expected effect

shortdef: to have the reverse of the desired or expected effect
to make or undergo a backfire

dt: {bc}a loud noise caused by the improperly timed explosion of fuel mixture in the cylinder of an internal combustion engine
{bc}a fire started to check an advancing fire by clearing an area

shortdef: a loud noise caused by the improperly timed explosion of fuel mixture in the cylinder of an internal combustion engine
a fire started to check an advancing fire by clearing an area
